trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Deklarerar behörigheter för att läsa in typer från sammansättningar som används av en XAML-läsaren eller skrivare.

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: XamlLoadPermission är relevant för scenarier, till exempel om interna typer tillåts att läsa in under partiellt förtroende.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> class, med hjälp av en enumerable för specifika <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Initierar ett anrop till den här konstruktorn i <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>samling med varje `allowedAccess` posten som ett objekt och anger avkastning för <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>till `false` skapade instans.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En enumerable uppsättning specifika <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värden.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessinnehåller ogiltig information, till exempel ett null-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> class, med hjälp av befintliga behörigheter.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>Anger avkastning för <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>till `true` skapade instans.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Alla anrop till den här konstruktorn anger den <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>samling till `null` eftersom det inte är relevant om behörigheter rapporteras i stället för <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> uppräkningsvärde.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> class, med hjälp av en enda <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värde.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Initierar ett anrop till den här konstruktorn i <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>samling med `allowedAccess` som det enda objektet och anger avkastning för <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>till `false` skapade instans.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den definierar <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värde.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar listan över alla <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värden som den här <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> representerar.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Om aktuellt <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>har initierats så att <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>är `true`, AllowedAccess kanske `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En skrivskyddad lista över <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> värden, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se anmärkning.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar och returnerar en identisk kopia av aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Per gränssnitt kontrakt av <xref:System.Security.IPermission>det här värdet är <xref:System.Security.IPermission>i signaturen men kan typkonverteras till <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopia av aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerar ett säkerhetsobjekt med ett angivet tillstånd från en XML-kodning.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-kodning som ska användas för att rekonstruera-objekt.

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: eleminnehåller inte XML-kodning för en .

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: - eller - Versionsattributet i elem stöds inte.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om detta <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> innehåller en angiven <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> i dess <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>lista.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: Specifikt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> att söka efter.

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: Om requestedAccess finns som ett objekt i den lista över aktuellt .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccessär null.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Skapar och returnerar ett <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> som skärningspunkten för aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> och den angivna behörigheten.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union-, intersect i, och vissa logik <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>kontrolleras först och kan returnera ett resultat enbart utifrån denna kontroll.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Nästa <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kontrolleras.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> korsa med aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny behörighet som representerar skärningspunkten för aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> och det angivna <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Den här nya behörigheten är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om skärningspunkten är tom.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Anger om aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> är en delmängd av den angivna behörigheten.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union-, intersect i, och vissa logik <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>kontrolleras först och kan returnera ett resultat enbart utifrån denna kontroll.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Nästa <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kontrolleras.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om `target` är `null` och aktuellt <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>är både <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` och har en tom <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>lista över den här metoden returnerar `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Behörigheter som ska testas för delmängd relationen.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> är en delmängd av den angivna behörigheten, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om detta <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> anger obegränsade behörigheter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den här <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> anger obegränsade behörigheter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Om den här <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> har specifika begränsningar i <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, eller inte har några behörigheter.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en XML-kodning av denna <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> och dess aktuella tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: En XML-kodning av denna <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>, inklusive statusinformation.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en behörighet som är unionen av aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> och den angivna behörigheten.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union-, intersect i, och vissa logik <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>kontrolleras först och kan returnera ett resultat enbart utifrån denna kontroll.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Nästa <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>kontrolleras.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om `other` är `null`, aktuellt <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>returneras.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> att kombinera med aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> som representerar unionen av aktuellt <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> och det angivna <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: other is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: otheris not or is not a .
